title: Child's creative work spreads through earned reach
description: Child's creative work spreads through earned reach
content:
Scenario: Child's creative work spreads through earned reach
    Given Emma creates a manga story about environmental conservation
    And she shares it in her manga artists community
    When other young artists appreciate and share her work
    And the story demonstrates both artistic skill and positive values
    Then the work travels through network based on genuine appreciation
    And it reaches other youth environmental and art communities
    And Emma experiences validation for quality contribution
    And she learns that good work naturally finds its audience
    And no algorithmic manipulation or viral exploitation occurs
